name: Super Death Shot 2020
description:
through the corridors of the red complex there lies many baddies awaiting punishment, you play as some guy who really wanted a pint but the red banned all the pints sso now you has to kill them and take the pint and get outta there in truen 1994 fashion.

"tastey"- the times 6/10

"this is a smelly one"- michal byea 5/5
